page.title: 10SPARE TIME IN DIGSWELL
page.content: Daddy spends his spare time writing to royal people in France, Spain and places like that. He does it because he likes writing. Mummy spends hers reading a magazine and putting her foot up because it still hurts after her car accident. I spend mine dancing or watching TV as its nice to do different things from schoolwork for a change.{Katie Cooke(9)} Mummy spends her time tidying up the house as she works as secretary at my school. Daddy reads the paper and watches TV. When you ask him a question, over and over again, he says "Pardon?" after a long time - so you have to tell him again. My sister and I play badminton, squash, tennis, swimming, ice-skating and ballet.{ {Claire Smith(9)}
